actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: To amend section 324 of title 32, United States Code, to permit the Secretary of the Army and the Secretary of the Air Force to defer the discharge of an officer of the National Guard when such officer becomes 64 years of age.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army or the Secretary of the Air Force to defer the required discharge of an officer at 64 years of age when such deferment is in the interest of the National Guard.

titles.title: To amend section 324 of title 32, United States Code, to permit the Secretary of the Army and the Secretary of the Air Force to defer the discharge of an officer of the National Guard when such officer becomes 64 years of age.
